channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.3.0
item.description:
New Plugin Debug View

New Multiple SF Symbols with different colors

New Added support for xbar-plugins repository

New Preferences UI

Fixed Correct handling of a sleep\wake cycle

Fixed Color names work in lowercase but not in mixed case

Fixed Image tint in menu bar should match text color when selected

Fixed Manual refresh leads to excessive scheduled refreshes

Fixed Plugin menu items don't align with SwiftBar menu items
